rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open area with Kerala style entrance arches and natural stone flooring. Vastu compliant for welcoming energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with traditional wooden beams and stone masonry; located in the northeast direction to harness positive energies according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room. Utilizes natural lighting; designed with Kerala motifs and local materials.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom with Kerala style wooden interiors and built-in wardrobes. Positioned in the southwest quadrant following Vastu for restful sleep.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room designed with traditional Kerala aesthetic; located adjacent to master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom integrated near the bedrooms. Traditional stone tiling aligns with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala kitchen designed for culinary art; includes open cooking area and storage, positioned in the east as per local norms.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-ventilated space with natural light; designed to blend traditional Kerala style with modern fitness requirements.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace located in a quiet corner of the house; combines traditional elements with ergonomic design principles.

rooms.name: Open Courtyard
rooms.description: Central open space for ventilation and social gatherings. Features traditional Kerala landscaping and stone pathways.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light; designed to enhance the ambience in keeping with Vastu guidelines.
Windows placed for cross ventilation and natural lighting.
Large windows for natural lighting and ventilation.
